CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store, Inc.

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 305 HARTMANN DRIVE, LEBANON, Tennessee, 37087-4779, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc operates hundreds of full-service restaurants throughout the United States. Its restaurants are open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with menus that offer home-style country food. Cracker Barrel's biggest input costs are beef, dairy, fruits and vegetables, pork, and poultry. The company purchases its food products from a few different vendors on a cost-plus basis. All restaurants are located in freestanding buildings and include gift shops, which contribute roughly one fourth of total company revenue. Apparel and accessories are the company's biggest revenue generators in the retail segment of the business.
